text: تَبَـٰرَكَ ٱلَّذِى بِيَدِهِ ٱلْمُلْكُ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ قَدِيرٌ

translation.en.sahih: Blessed is He in whose hand is dominion, and He is over all things competent -
translation.id.indonesian: Maha Suci Allah Yang di tangan-Nya-lah segala kerajaan, dan Dia Maha Kuasa atas segala sesuatu,
